questions.quote: God. Man, this is killing me. Right now, I would give that bike to the first person who could make this pain go away.
Elaine, don't get too down. Everything'll even out, see, I have two friends, you were up,  he was down. Now he's up,  you're down. You see how it all evens out for me?
